sentences.english: The feasibility of ergosterol as an index to estimate grain safety degree was discussed in this thesis.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了麦角甾醇作为评价粮食质量安全指标的可行性。

sentences.english: This paper is a study of culture medium of Claviceps Paspali for ergot alkali fermentation.
sentences.chinese: 对产麦角碱雀稗麦角菌的发酵培养基进行了研究。

sentences.english: This paper is a study of culture medium of Claviceps Paspali for ergot alkali fermentation.
sentences.chinese: 对产麦角碱雀稗麦角菌的发酵培养基进行了研究。

sentences.english: He was given narcotics, barbiturates and ergot alkaloids.

sentences.english: Avoid concomitant ergotamine and related drugs.
sentences.chinese: 避免随之而来的麦角胺和相关药物。

sentences.english: Concentration of ergosterol was measured by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 利用HPLC检测麦角甾醇的含量。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect on nicergoline in treatment of multi infarct dementia .
sentences.chinese: 目的观察尼麦角林治疗多发性梗死性痴呆临床疗效。

sentences.english: Aim To optimize the technology preparation of nicergoline for injection.
sentences.chinese: 目的优化注射用尼麦角林的工艺处方。

sentences.english: The density of capillary bed in the ulcer area of ergonovine group decreased.
sentences.chinese: 麦角新碱组毛细血管床密度降低。

sentences.english: Ergocalciferol at high levels also is toxic to chickness.
sentences.chinese: 高水平的麦角钙化醇对鸡也是有毒害的。

sentences.english: Fungus Zhuhuang contains extremely small quantity of peroxy-ergosterol.
sentences.chinese: 目的测定真菌竹黄中过氧麦角甾醇的含量。

sentences.english: However, it had no effect on sterol biosynthesis of this fungus.
sentences.chinese: 武夷菌素对灰霉菌菌丝麦角甾醇的合成影响不大。
